title: Wikipedia Research
snippet:
## Wikipedia Results for: Will Ali Khamenei cease to be Supreme Leader of Iran before 2027?

### Next Supreme Leader of Iran election
An election for the third supreme leader of Iran will be held following the end of the current tenure of Ali Khamenei. As of July 2025, no person has been officially declared as the heir to Khamenei nor as a nominee, though various sources such as Reuters and BBC News have reported on potential candidates.
